msbt.message: Don't the plants look happy now that spring is here?
Yo! It's summer! Time to start incorporating WAY more mesh into my everyday outfits.
Do you also hear the soft whispers of insects in the night? What do you think of theirumdemands?
When it's really cold like this, I like to wear the tightest clothes I own.Uh, because they're warm. Yeah, that's the reason why.

THIS year—THIS summer—is going to be the one that I finally take up diving! You can bet on it. Diving into my fluffy duvet after a lazy afternoon , more like. Ha HA! Preemptive self-own so the haters can't get me down.

Fall's blowing in and that can only mean one thingjacket weather!Take it from me, nothing adds more style to a blustery stroll than an extra layer or two. And don't be afraid to take a note from the changing leaves by adding a pop of color to your ensemble. I'm talking scarves, !

Another cold one today Guess it's time to pull out the ultra-wool, self-warming knee socks. That's right! I've discovered high-tech winterwear, !No more hibernating all winter long, desperately awaiting the first day of spring and its cute outfits.Now I just slip on my triple-insulated snow pants lined with waterproof safety technology and I'm all good!
Spring is a time for new beginnings, isn't it? Don't worry—I'm not going anywhere today, !
Ah, spring. Time to shake things up and really throw everyone for a spin Oh, don't worry, . I'm just talking about maybe trying out a new shirt. Too crazy, right?
I always feel like I should take on a new project at the beginning of spring Something out of character for melike !Know where I can find any designer gear?
I always feel like the beginning of spring is a good time to start a new hobby. Something like!<10_4 /> It has to be something I can do while sipping on , you see.

There's just something about fireworks in the summer that take me back to my childhood Yepsmoke from the grill, fresh corn on the cobdoing a little with Dad.Meanwhile, Mom's just getting back from playing bass on tour with her band Good times.

Summer is a time to really show off your fashion sense.Because, you know, you've gotta dress for the hot weather, but also wear something elaborate and chic. Likea 20-gallon sombrero to block the sun, paired with something I like to call"yoga shorts." Are you in or are you IN?
Fall is kind of an in-between season, don't you think?It's a good time to catch up on some reading and really get down to .
Fall is kind of an in-between season, don't you think?It's a good time to catch up on some reading and really get down to .
Sometimes in the winter it's fun to just go for a walk and look at all the lights and decorations Other times it's fun to sit by a roaring fire and sip a warm mug of <10_4 /> Don't judge me!
Sometimes in the winter it's fun to just go for a walk and look at all the lights and decorations Other times it's fun to sit by a roaring fire and sip a warm mug of <10_4 /> Don't judge me!
